hero.title: Analyze Your Poker Hands.

hero.inputLabel: Paste a single hand history for analysis
hero.instructionText: Paste the history of only one hand from PokerStars, GGPoker, etc. Our replayer has been optimized for detailed analysis of specific hands.
hero.placeholder:
Paste the text of a single hand history here...

Example:
PokerStars Hand #123456789: Hold'em No Limit ($0.25/$0.50 USD)
Table 'Table Name' 6-max Seat #1 is the button
...

about.title: About PokerMastery
about.introduction: We were born from the need of players and managers seeking a smarter way to study and manage the game.
about.storyContent: PokerMastery was created by professional players who understood firsthand the difficulties of evolving in modern poker. Hours analyzing hands manually, difficulty identifying patterns, expensive and complex tools that didn't deliver on their promises.
about.storyQuestion: What if there was a tool that really understood the needs of a grinder?
about.storyAnswer: The answer was the Hand Replayer ‚Äî our first tool, free and powerful. A simple and visual way to review your hands, understand your decisions and share analyses with coaches and teams.
about.storyFuture: But we didn't stop there. The Hand Replayer is just the entry point to a complete ecosystem we're building: intelligent bankroll management, gamified GTO laboratory, platform for coaches and a marketplace that connects players to the best professionals in the market.
about.missionText: Provide advanced tools and resources for poker players seeking to improve their skills and achieve superior results through data and technology.
about.visionText: Be the leading and indispensable platform in poker analysis and study, recognized for innovation, accuracy and being the secret weapon of the most dedicated players.
about.joinDescription: We're just getting started. Join us and get early access to everything we're building.

pricing.title: Plans and Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free with Hand Replayer. More features coming soon.
pricing.faq1Question: Is the Free plan really free forever?
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes! The Hand Replayer will always be free. When we launch premium features, you'll be able to continue using the Hand Replayer at no cost.
pricing.faq2Question: When will paid plans be launched?
pricing.faq2Answer: We're working hard on the complete ecosystem. Sign up now to be notified when we launch and get early access with special discount.
pricing.faq3Answer: Yes! When paid plans are launched, you can cancel anytime without penalties or additional fees.
